pages.summary: A statement of award from Francis Marion University for bindery services.

key_information.Description: Bindery Services including pickup and delivery of all bound items
key_information.Address of Awardee: 6204 Corporate Park Drive, Browns Summit, NC 27214

pages.text_content:
Francis Marion University
Purchasing Office
PO Box 100547
Florence, SC 29502-0547

Statement of Award
Posting Date: 11/02/2018

This is a statement of award and serves as acceptance of your offer.

Contractor should not perform work prior to the receipt of a purchase order from Francis Marion University. The University assumes no liability for any expenses incurred prior to the effective date of the contract and issuance of a purchase order.

Description: Bindery Services including pickup and delivery of all bound items
Issue Date of Intent to Sole Source: 10/15/2018
Award Posting Date: 11/02/2018
Sole Source Awarded To: HF Group
Address: 6204 Corporate Park Drive, Browns Summit, NC 27214

Amount: On an as-needed basis.

Director of Purchasing
Paul J. MacDonald
